ðŸ“– Summary: The Redirector browser extension allows users to redirect URLs based on defined regex or wildcard patterns, functioning as a client-side mod_rewrite. It supports multiple browsers and provides examples for common use cases like de-mobilizing websites, escaping doubleclick tracking, redirecting AMP pages, and customizing DuckDuckGo !bangs.
